column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column6: anaa ofi ahɔho a wɔabɔsoɛ Israel mu a ɔdze n'asefo mu bi ma Molek no; okum na wonku no: asaase no do nkorɔfo no mfa abo nsiw no."

column2: "Mo so mebɛma m'enyi asa nyimpa no
column3: na metwa no efi ne man mu akyen; osiandɛ ɔdze n'asefo mu bi ama Molek
column5: na oehura me dzin krɔnkrɔn no ho."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔdze n'asefo mu bi rema Molek no
column3: na asaase no do nkorɔfo nam kwan biara do kata hɔn enyiwa fi nyimpa no do

column2: "ɔno mebɛma m'enyi asa nyimpa no
column3: na asa n'ebusuafo
column5: ɔno nye hɔn a wodzi n'ekyir ndwamanyɛ mu
column6: dɛ wɔnye Molek bɛyɛ ndwamandze no

column2: "Na obiara a ɔdan no ho kɔ hɔn a wɔyɛ adzebisafo
column3: na esumamfo hɔ kedzi hɔn ekyir ndwamanyɛ mu no
column4: mebɛma m'enyi asa dɛm nyimpa no
column5: na metwa no efi ne man mu akyen."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ntsew homho
column3: na hom nyɛ krɔnkrɔn: na emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na hom ndzi m'ahyɛdze do
column3: na wɔnyɛ: emi nye EWURADZE a metsew hom ho no."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔdom n'egya anaa ne na no
column3: oku na wonku no: osiandɛ ɔadom n'egya anaa ne na; no bɔgyaa ngu n'etsifi."

column2: "Na ɔbanyin a ɔfa ɔbanyin bi so ne yer no
column3: mekyerɛ nyia ɔfa ne nyɛnko ne yer no
column4: oku na wonku ɔyefafo nye okumfafo no."

column2: "Na ɔbanyin a ɔnye n'egya ne yer da no
column3: oeyi n'egya n'adagyaw do
column4: oku na wonku hɔn beenu nyina; hɔn bɔgyaa ngu hɔn etsifi."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbanyin nye n'asew a ɔyɛ ne ba ne yer da a
column3: oku na wonku hɔn beenu nyina: wɔayɛ sakasaka; hɔn bɔgyaa ngu hɔn etsifi."

column2: "Na sɛ banyin nye banyin bi da
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔnye ɔbaa da a
column4: hɔn beenu nyina ayɛ ekyiwadze: oku na wonku hɔn; hɔn bɔgyaa ngu hɔn etsifi."

column2: "Na sɛ banyin bi fa yer nye ne na nyinara a
column3: ɔyɛ ebusudze: wɔmfa gya nhyew hɔn
column4: ɔno nye hɔn nyinara; amma ebusudze aammba hom mu."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbanyin nye abowa bi da a
column3: oku na wonku no: na hom nku abowa no."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbaa bi kɔ abowa biara hɔ
column3: na ɔkɛda hɔ ma no a
column5: nye abowa no: oku na wonku hɔn; hɔn bɔgyaa ngu hɔn etsifi."

column2: "Na sɛ banyin fa n'akyerɛbaa
column3: n'egya ne babaa
column6: na no so hu n'adagyaw a
column7: ɔyɛ enyimguase adze; na wontwitwa hɔn ngu wɔ hɔn man mba enyim: oeyi n'akyerɛbaa n'adagyaw do; ɔnsoa no mbusu."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbanyin bi nye ɔbaa ɔbrafo bi da
column3: na oyi n'adagyaw do a; na oebue no bura ano
column4: na ɔno so oeyi no bɔgyaa bura do; wontwitwa hɔn beenu nyina mfi hɔn man mu ngu."

column2: "Na mma nnyi wo na n'akyerɛbaa anaa w'egya n'akyerɛbaa n'adagyaw do: ɔno so oeyi no bɔgyaa a ɔbɛn n'adagyaw do: wɔnsoa hɔn mbusu."
"Na sɛ ɔbanyin bi nye no wɔfa ne yer da a
column3: oeyi no wɔfa n'adagyaw do: wɔnsoa hɔn bɔn; wɔronnwo ba na woewu."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbanyin bi fa no nua ne yer a
column3: ɔyɛ adze fi: oeyi no nua n'adagyaw do; worinnya ba."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ndzi m'ahyɛdze nyinara
column3: nye me ntsɛmbu nyinara do
column4: na wɔnyɛ: amma asaase no a medze hom rokɔ hɔ akɛtsena do no aammfe hom enngu."

column2: "Na mma hom mmfa ɔman a murubotu hɔn wɔ hom enyim no hɔn amambra do: na wɔyɛɛ ndzɛmba iyinom nyinara
column3: na dɛm ntsi hɔn ho yɛɛ me mfon."

column2: "Na mese hom dɛ
column3: Hom na wonnya hɔn asaase no ndzi
column4: na medze mema hom dɛ hom enyadze
column5: asaase a numfonsu nye wo pem wɔ do: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a mapaa hom efi amanaman mu no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom mpaa mbowa a hɔn ho tsew nye dza hɔn ho nntsew mu
column3: nye nnoma a hɔn ho nntsew nye dza hɔn ho tsew mu: na mma hom mmfa abowa
column5: anaa adze biara a ɔwea famu a mapaa no wɔ hom ho dɛ no ho nntsew no nngu hom akra ho fi."

column2: "Na hom nyɛ krɔnkrɔn mma me: na emi EWURADZE meyɛ krɔnkrɔn
column3: na mapaa hom efi amanaman mu dɛ hom mbɛyɛ medze."

column2: "Ɔbanyin bi so anaa ɔbaa bi a ɔyɛ adzebisafo
column3: anaa ɔyɛ esumamfo no
column4: oku na wonku no: wɔmfa abo nsiw hɔn: hɔn bɔgyaa ngu hɔn etsifi."
